00050         inline bool isSaved() { return saved; }
00051         inline bool reset(bool force=false) {
00052                 // run implicit save 
00053                 if (! saved) {
00054                         OnBnClickedBnAcq_Handler(DLG_LFT_RESET);
00055                 }
00056                 // check if save was successful
00057                 if ((! saved) && (! force))
00058                         return false;
00059 
00060                 // reset dialog item values
00061                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_CUSTOMER)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No customer info set]"));
00062                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_LOC)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No location info set]"));
00063                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_GPS)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No GPS info associated]"));
00064                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_SI)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No sample name set]"));
00065                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_CN)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No calibration curve loaded]"));
00066                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_CP)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No calibration parameters]"));
00067                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_RES)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No concentration determined]"));
00068                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_CN_F)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No fit formula]"));
00069                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_CN_R)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No rsquared]"));
00070                 GetDlgItem(IDC_ST_ACQ_FN)->SetWindowTextA(_T("[No data saved]"));
00071 
00072                 saved=true; laststage=DLG_LFT_RESET; 
00073                 return true;
00074         }

00109         inline void getCursorInfo(int *nm_id,int wv_id,CString *name, double *wv_val,double *in_val) {
00110                 int idmax=-1;
00111                 if (BaselineSpec.is_valid() && LastSpec.is_valid()) { idmax=2; }
00112                 else if (BaselineSpec.is_valid()) { idmax=0; }
00113 
00114                 *nm_id=max(*nm_id,   -1);
00115                 *nm_id=min(*nm_id,idmax);
00116                 switch (*nm_id) {
00117                         case 2:
00118                                 *name="Data"; 
00119                                 *wv_val=((LastSpec-BaselineSpec).getWavelengths().getDoubleValues())[wv_id];
00120                                 *in_val=((LastSpec-BaselineSpec).getIntensities().getDoubleValues())[wv_id];
00121                                 break;
00122                         case 1:
00123                                 *name="Raw"; 
00124                                 *wv_val=(LastSpec.getWavelengths().getDoubleValues())[wv_id];
00125                                 *in_val=(LastSpec.getIntensities().getDoubleValues())[wv_id];
00126                                 break;
00127                         case 0:
00128                                 *name="Baseline"; 
00129                                 *wv_val=(BaselineSpec.getWavelengths().getDoubleValues())[wv_id];
00130                                 *in_val=(BaselineSpec.getIntensities().getDoubleValues())[wv_id];
00131                                 break;
00132                         default:
00133                                 *name="No Data";
00134                                 *wv_val=0;
00135                                 *in_val=0;
00136                                 break;
00137                 }
00138         }
